content: pdf digital download crochet pattern quick and easy crochet basket made in sprightly yarns wool/acrylic super bulky use rope handles to give that rustic farmhouse style to your home decor use in the kitchen or bathroom for practical storage or use as a gift basket / easter basket full video included for small basket on youtube and small basket pattern is free on the blog **yarn requirements ** sprightly yarns acrylic wool super bulky 80% acrylic 20% wool 5 25oz/150g/98yds/89m shown in greige charcoal heather and grey owl buy yarn here at our affiliate link http //shrsl com/1lelp sizes s m l balls needed 1 2 3 finished measurements height 5 5 8 5 10 5 diameter 7 5 9 5 11 5 crochet hook requirements us n/15 10mm or size needed to obtain gauge additional supplies yarn needle rope jute cord 4ply two 12 14 16 lengths for handles garment tag & embroidery thread optional gauge 7 sts and 10 rounds equal to 4 in waistcoat stitch the pattern is written in standard american terms you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online please reference me as the designer all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final
